verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba yetu wa Mbinguni
Jina lako litukuzwe
Ufalme wako na ufike
Utakalo lifanyike.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Dunia kama Mbinguni
utupe leo mkate wetu
mkate wetu wa kila siku
(Baba)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tusamehe makosa yetu
(Baba),
Kama vile twawasamehe
(wale),
Waliotukosea sisi (Baba).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Situtie majaribuni (Baba),
walakini utuopoe (kweli),
maovuni utuopoe (Baba).

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kwa kuwa ufalme ni wako
(Baba),
pia nguvu na utukufu
(kweli),
utukufu hata milele
(Baba).
